html:
10.6.21  2:56 am   At of all the songs you have made what was your favorite one to make 

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

10.6.21  2:19 am   would having a song you really like as your ringtone eventually ruin it for you?

     it would delete the bass track, at least

     also what's your ringtone

     none

10.5.21  11:25 pm   should I be worried that the chords for so many of the songs I write end up being G C?

      the main thing you should worry about is whether or not you should worry

10.5.21  10:41 pm   Thoughts on the sun?

      "oh gosh it's very hot here" ... "i must have melted already"

10.5.21  10:34 pm   What do you believe in?

      you

10.5.21  10:26 pm   Any plans for a new video?

      the reason i hate that plan is because it's not nearly enough videos

10.5.21  9:41 pm   favorite font?

      hot cakes

10.5.21  8:47 pm   why does it seem like everyone around me is infinitely better than me? it's making me feel insecure. unreasonably insecure

      this may seem cruel, but this is to drive you to be as good as you can

10.5.21  7:14 pm   If I worked really hard on something and it's just crap, does it still matter?

      yes

10.5.21  2:38 pm   What is beyond the universe

      things you can only imagine

10.5.21  2:27 pm   When are you going to start using padding instead of non-breaking spaces when formatting your answers on this page?

      when it matters

10.5.21  2:25 pm   Do you believe people change their minds, or that their minds change them? Or is this avante garde bullshit that doesn't mean anything?

      you can change your mind. this is the basis of consciousness. if you couldn't do it, then there would be 'nobody home', so to speak

10.5.21  12:32 pm   why are pianos so much fun

      because they allow anyone to play music, very easily

10.5.21  11:56 am   what's the most random thing that could possibly happen?

      after 30 seconds of rainfall, 1 specific point on the ground may be wet or dry

10.5.21  11:31 am   do you consider 25 to be a round number?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

10.5.21  11:12 am   how to make music?

      impossible. it can't be done

10.5.21  11:10 am   why are u so cool

      you could be looking in a mirror

10.5.21  11:05 am   what do you know about time, and dreams.

     crazy

      and is there other similar things

      yes, although now that i think about it, i have to say that 'time' and 'dreams' seem to encompass just about everything

10.5.21  10:29 am   Are you going to make music until you die?

     yes, if i can

      Or are you planning on stopping at some point.

      no

10.5.21  7:52 am   Do you ever miss making short 5-10 second long videos, or do you have more fun making several minute long ones?

      what i hate about short videos is how short they are to watch. and what i hate about long videos is how long they take to make. so in that sense, i hate them both

10.5.21  4:45 am   How long did it took to make and render "Here comes the sun"?

     about 4 months, but maybe it was more like 2 months if you don't count all the time i was working on additional production developments, or being devastatingly discouraged by my own inability to find any responsible way of accomplishing anything

10.5.21  4:27 am   Bill, thank you for all your content, you're a force for good in the world, in my opinion, and I look forward to watching more of your stuff. My question is what instrument invention or adaptation would you make if you had the time (define instrument as loosely as you like), and what historical instrument would you like to play if given the chance? Thanks again for all your content and I hope you have a successful day :)

      if would be nice if there was an acoustic keyboard that was lightweight and still loud enough

10.5.21  3:32 am   hey bill! How ya doing?

      pretty good

10.5.21  2:30 am   Is your music the best music ever?

      no, but it could be if i could learn to do my damn job properly

10.5.21  12:57 am   How do I get over my fear of growing up

      you're gonna have to try it

10.5.21  12:49 am   how long did it take to produce the song for the video you're currently working on,

     4 months, but maybe it was more like 2 months if you don't count all the time i was working on additional production developments, or being devastatingly discouraged by my own inability to find any responsible way of accomplishing anything

      and do you expect that time to decrease for future songs?

     if it doesn't then i'll probably have to quit

10.4.21  11:19 pm   Do you ever find albums to be cool when made by other people?

      the idea of an album is cool, but i've never found one that actually sounds cool. i suspect i may be thinking of something different..... maybe some kind of stage play or feature film

10.4.21  9:57 pm   thoughts on non-fiction stories

      too real

10.4.21  9:38 pm   will you ever do something unexpected from what you are?

      yes

10.4.21  9:05 pm   Why did you event a new genre of music?

      for survival

10.4.21  5:15 pm   In your first reality video, you stacked some books and a bottle of tide. Is is still stacked up?

      no. that's why it was so important to capture it on video

10.4.21  4:44 pm   how do you feel about shoes

      pretty good

10.4.21  3:23 pm   In "got some money" when you say "one day we'll/will feel complete" is one of the two correct, or are both, or is it up to the listener to decide?

      double meanings in songs is considered a sign of great power and wealth, in some cultures

10.4.21  2:22 pm   how hard is it to think?

      the hardest part is remembering how easy it is

10.4.21  1:01 pm   How to motivate myself to study something I don't wanna study? 

      find out what your reason is for doing it. play your whole strategy directly into that reason. it should bring things a little more into focus. On the other hand, if you actually don't have a reason for doing it, then simply don't do it

10.4.21  12:57 pm   thoughts on cold weather

      it reminds me just a little bit of the depths of outer space

10.4.21  12:42 pm   Do you have any advice about writing lyrics about terrible stuff that has happened to you? 

      try it, and see if you like it

10.4.21  12:12 pm   bill are you an anime character 

      no

10.4.21  10:40 am   what are your thoughts on the pills people take to artificially make them more "happy" and/or "normal"?

      sounds so crazy it just might work

10.4.21  9:40 am   Why do you use Helvetica in most of your videos?

      this is to convey a milieu normalcy, and normal values

10.4.21  9:24 am   does "i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes" mean that you weren't thinking about the question when you were originally answering?

      it usually means that my first answer, when thinking about it only a tiny bit, is no, and then when i think about it more, i change my mind to yes

10.4.21  8:46 am   it's been a few years since you made the song "i just did a bad thing" however I wonder, do you still regret the thing you did?

      that song is not based on any specific bad thing

10.4.21  8:25 am   Bill, have you ever felt like everyone is so different to you, and you don't belong anywhere?.

     yes

      I'm felling this all the time and I don't know what to do because I don't seem to feel comfortable with any kind of person or group. Any advice?

      how about making a website about yourself

10.4.21  7:12 am   is there some meanings in songs you've released

      yes, they are supposed to mean everything. that is my target meaning

10.4.21  6:16 am   are you currently writing a new song

      no, but i should be. What i'm doing instead is producing a video for a song i wrote and produced earlier

10.4.21  3:49 am   on a scale from money to and the day goes on, how dark / bright is the new song, musically? if you answer this i will be shocked.

      7

10.4.21  1:06 am   is there going to be a follow-up play with the iphone power block and mechanical pencil?

     yes

     I think they are wasted potential

      everything i do seems like wasted potential UNLESS, you stop to consider the fact that there is possibly a limited amount of time in my lifetime

10.4.21  1:06 am   do you know how to dance

      no one knows. that's what makes it so good

10.4.21  12:58 am   do you think toast is good

      it's a little bit good

10.4.21  12:38 am   Can you read a picture 

      yep
